question: A puppy has been kidnapped by the evil king and is trapped inside a castle, guarded by a dragon. Your venture will be tough. Here are some items that might help you on your quest. Choose wisely!
Shortly after you beging your quest reach a fork in the road. To the left: a scorching desert, straight ahead: a steep moutain and to the right: a raging river. Which road do you take?

paths.name: desert
paths.goodMessage: After walking the desert for hours, you emerge on the other side, feeling good about bringing a bottle of water 🥤 as it saves you from dehydration. You press on.
paths.okMessage: The umbrella ☂️ saved you from the scorching sun but you emerge from the desert severly dehydrated and weakened. You lose one ❤️
paths.failMessage: The sun burns your skin and you sweat every last drop of water in your body. With your last efforts you think you probebly should have brought someting different with you into this scorching desert.

paths.name: mountain
paths.goodMessage: After successfully climbing the steep mountain you use your rope 🪢 you mange to touch down on the ground softly. You push forward
paths.okMessage: Halfway down the steep mountain you loose you footing, sliding down the mountain wall. You scrape everu inch of your body but thanks to your helmet 🪖 you survive. You lose one ❤️
paths.failMessage: You lose you footing and tumble down the mountain side, crushing every bone in your body. Right before your last breath you think that you probably should have brought something else to this steep mountain.

paths.name: river
paths.goodMessage: With your inflateble canoe 🛶 you raft down the river with great effort. Exiting to the shore you feel a litter tired but pumped up by adrenalin. You push forward
paths.okMessage: Swimming down the river you hit your head and body on rocks and floating debris. Thanks to the life-jacket 🦺 you stay afloat on the dangerous waters. You exit the river alive but severely injured. You lose one ❤️
paths.failMessage: You attemt to swim along the river but its currents are too strong and you are pulled under water to a certain death. As your last breath is bubblig out through your nose you think you probably should have brought someting different to this ragig river.

question: You see the castle in the the distance. As you walk closer, doubt seeps into your mind. You begin to question whether you have what it take for this dire quest. You stop and ponder: Do I continue? Do turn back?

paths.name: continue
paths.goodMessage: Pleased with your decision you press on, thinking you can overcome anything.

paths.name: resign
paths.failMessage: What? You resign? This quest is about saving an adorable puppy and you resign? To hell with you 'adventurer'!

question: Closing in on the caslte you try to come up with a plan to get past the dragon. You figure you have three options: try and soothe it, attack it or sneek past it. What do you decide is the best course of action?

paths.name: soothe
paths.goodMessage: You puck your favourite lullaby on the strings of your guitar 🎸. With a fiery yawn the dragon curls up and is soon sound asleep. You gently push the doors open and enter the castle.
paths.okMessage: You hold out the chicken leg 🍗 to the dragon. Swiftly it snatches it from your grip and accidentally also takes off a few of you fingers. The dragon is pleased with its' meal. You enter the castle, feeling dizzy from the blood loss. You lose one ❤️
paths.failMessage: Thinking of how your mother used to comfort you as a baby, you walk up to the dragon to give it a warm hug. Your attemt fails and the dragon eats you alive. As you see the dragons jaws close from the inside you think you probebly should have brought someting different on this journey.

paths.name: attack
paths.goodMessage: You pull out your sword 🗡 and thrust it in to the dragons heart, killing it in an instant. Feeling triumphant and without empathy for the dead creature you burst open the doors and enter the castle.
paths.okMessage: You rush toward the dragon straight on holding up your shield 🛡, you block most of the dragons firey breath and knock it uncontious with a bash. You limp through the caslte doors with your legs severely burned. You lose one ❤️.
paths.failMessage: You flail your arms around you, trying och knock out the dragon. Your attemt fails and the dragon eats you alive. As you see the dragons jaws close from the inside you think you probebly should have brought someting different on this journey.

paths.name: sneak
paths.goodMessage: Inspired by Harry Potter, you use your invisibility cloak 🧥 to safely sneak past the dragon. Unnoticed, you slip into the castle.
paths.okMessage: With the moccasins on your feet you tiptoe towards the entrance without a sound. Unfortunately the dragon has great eye sight and sends out a firey breath towards you. You dash into the castle and realize your hair is on fire. You pat it out with your hands but your head are burned beyond recognition. You lose one ❤️
paths.failMessage: You do your best to crouch down but the dragon can both see and hear you. I walks up to you and eats you alive. As you see the dragons jaws close from the inside you think you probebly should have brought someting different on this journey.

question: You see the adorable puppy 🐶 lying relaxed on its side, bound by its feet, and you realize you are going to have to carry it. The puppy is huge, turns out it's a Great Dane. Beside the pubby you see a marvelous treasure 🏆. You only have strenght enought to carry one of them. What will you take with you?

paths.name: puppy
paths.goodMessage: You pick the puppy up and walk to wards the back exit. The puppy happliy greets you, licking your face.

paths.name: treasure
paths.failMessage: The treasure? Really! You are a horrible, greedy person! Game over for you 'adventurer'!
